com.googlecode.jmxtrans.model.output
Class GangliaWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.jmxtrans.util.BaseOutputWriter
      com.googlecode.jmxtrans.model.output.GangliaWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
OutputWriter
public class GangliaWriter
extends BaseOutputWriter

A cool writer for Ganglia. This is heavily inspired and somewhat copied from code in Hadoop (GangliaContext).

Author:
jon

          Puts an integer into the buffer as 4 bytes, big-endian.
protected  void xdr_string(java.lang.String s)
          Puts a string into the buffer by first writing the size of the string as an int, followed by the bytes of the string, padded if necessary to a multiple of 4.
